name: Snooze (teebaron)
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$280550

“Moin” again and Happy 50th LudumDare!

This time, we play an alarm clock, which task is to wake the human up to go to work. But as you can guess, the human tries to delay that part of the day. Maybe we can prevent him pressing the damn snooze button, if we’re quick enough…

Controls: ←, A ► Move Left →, D ► Move Right
R ► Reload Level ↑, W, Space ► Jump

NOTE: Everything you see (graphics) and hear (music) we’ve created ourselves.

Go, wake him up and have fun!

We Used

Unity 2020.3.32f1
JetBrains Rider GitHub Sublime Merge
Photopea

LD50-Theme: Delay the inevitable
